alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL BAYFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Cornucopia, to near Oulu, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Bayfield and northeastern Douglas Counties, including the following locations... Waino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
